name: Default Dan
description: Coins are bad? Spikes are good! Looks can be deceiving in Default Dan, an indie platformer that flips the genre upside down.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 gHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Like Super Mario Bros had a baby with Super Meat Boy, and the baby was raised by an abusive uncle who only spoke backwards.

I love this game- I got the Beta for this game and actually got to suggest things that went into it. This game really makes you flustered with the new ideas but it is also done flawlessly. I love this game and can't wait to finish it for a 2nd time- Default Dan is also a great game for speedrunning- we already have 4 people at the top every time- refreshing to see :) 9/10 game (only because 10/10 aint real!)  Truly,   TwR

Saw that this game on a fundraising page and wanted to give money to it but it was over. I didnt no when it was released and saw it on steam and I bought it without hesitation. I played a demo of this game last year and was amazed by how unique the gameplay is. It takes everything you know about classic mario games and makes forget everything you have learned. The graphics are not the greatest But they arent terrible. This is an Amazing game and I recommend it if you are tired of old fashion Platformers!!!! 9.8/10

this game is ♥♥♥♥ing ♥♥♥♥ you can not run and jump at the same time what is ♥♥♥♥ when the game has the most stupit boss fights,♥♥♥♥ enemies,ear bleeding music and the most broken way of attacking i can not get passed the first ♥♥♥♥ing boss because evey time i hit its ♥♥♥ and i mean its ♥♥♥ (also thats how you kill things in this game by hitting its ♥♥♥) it kills me and i know you do it this way because i have seen and read a buch of walkthrough on this game 2/10 only thing i liked was the cutscenes and the consept what i think is pritty cool eveything else was ♥♥♥♥.
